trans-unit.source: Provides an interface for managing designer transactions and components.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于管理设计器的事务和组件的接口。

trans-unit.source: IDesignerHost is an interface that works with the .NET Framework forms designer architecture to provide support for designer transaction and component management.
trans-unit.target: IDesignerHost 是接口，适用于.NET Framework 窗体设计器结构，以提供针对设计器事务和组件的管理支持。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not provide an implementation of this interface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 不提供此接口的实现。

trans-unit.source: The interface is implemented by development tools that support designers.
trans-unit.target: 支持设计器的开发工具通过实现该接口。

trans-unit.source: Activates the designer that this host is hosting.
trans-unit.target: 激活此主机承载的设计器。

trans-unit.source: Designers should be activated before they display their user interface.
trans-unit.target: 应激活设计器，才能显示其用户界面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this designer is activated.
trans-unit.target: 激活此设计器时发生。

trans-unit.source: A designer is activated before it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 它显示之前，将激活设计器。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container for this designer host.
trans-unit.target: 获取此设计器宿主的容器。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> contains the components of the current design mode document.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>包含当前的设计模式文档的组件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: You can list or access any of the components of the current design mode document through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer.Components%2A> member of this <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 可以列表，也可以通过<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer.Components%2A>此<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>的成员</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer.Components%2A>访问任何当前的设计模式文档的组件

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> for this host.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>此主机。

trans-unit.source: Creates a component of the specified type and adds it to the design document.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定类型的一个组件，并将其添加到设计文档。

trans-unit.source: If the type cannot be resolved into an object that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型不能解析为实现的对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>，将引发异常。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: This method does not specify a name for the component.
trans-unit.target: 此方法未指定该组件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The method creates the component and adds it to the designer container.
trans-unit.target: 方法创建该组件，并将其添加到设计器的容器。

trans-unit.source: The type of the component to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的组件的类型。

trans-unit.source: The newly created component.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a component of the specified type and name, and adds it to the design document.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个组件的指定的类型和名称，并将其添加到设计文档。

trans-unit.source: If the type cannot be resolved into an object that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型不能解析为实现的对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>，将引发异常。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: This method creates the component and adds it to the designer container.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建该组件，并将其添加到设计器的容器。

trans-unit.source: The type of the component to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的组件的类型。

trans-unit.source: The name for the component.
trans-unit.target: 组件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The newly created component.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的组件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction"></xref> that can encapsulate event sequences to improve performance and enable undo and redo support functionality.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction"></xref>可以封装事件序列以提高性能并启用撤消和重做支持功能。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> that can be used to encapsulate a series of operations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>可以用于封装一系列操作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: Designer transactions can improve performance, reduce flicker caused by multiple updates during a process of operations, and enable most operations to be undone.
trans-unit.target: 设计器事务可以提高性能、 减少闪烁引起的操作，过程的多个更新和启用大多数撤消的操作。

trans-unit.source: Lengthy operations that involve multiple components can raise many events.
trans-unit.target: 涉及多个组件的较长操作可以引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: These events can cause side effects, such as flicker or degraded performance.
trans-unit.target: 这些事件可能会导致副作用，如闪烁或性能下降。

trans-unit.source: When operating on multiple components at one time, or setting multiple properties on a single component, you can improve performance by performing these changes within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 当多个组件上一次运行或在单个组件上设置多个属性时，你可以通过执行这些事务内的更改来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Some operations handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionOpening> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> events and perform work only when a transaction is not in progress.
trans-unit.target: 某些操作处理<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionOpening>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed>事件并仅在一个事务未正在进行时，才执行工作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionOpening>

trans-unit.source: For more information on using transactions, see the documentation for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 使用事务的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>的文档

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you complete the steps in your transaction, you should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*> on this object.
trans-unit.target: 当事务中完成的步骤时，应调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>对此对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction"></xref> that can encapsulate event sequences to improve performance and enable undo and redo support functionality, using the specified transaction description.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction"></xref>可以封装事件序列以提高性能并启用撤消和重做支持功能，使用指定的事务的说明。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> that can be used to encapsulate a series of operations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>可以用于封装一系列操作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: Designer transactions can improve performance, reduce flicker caused by multiple updates during a process of operations, and enable most operations to be undone.
trans-unit.target: 设计器事务可以提高性能、 减少闪烁引起的操作，过程的多个更新和启用大多数撤消的操作。

trans-unit.source: Lengthy operations that involve multiple components can raise many events.
trans-unit.target: 涉及多个组件的较长操作可以引发多个事件。

trans-unit.source: These events can cause side effects, such as flicker or degraded performance.
trans-unit.target: 这些事件可能会导致副作用，如闪烁或性能下降。

trans-unit.source: When operating on multiple components at one time, or setting multiple properties on a single component, you can improve performance by performing these changes within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 当多个组件上一次运行或在单个组件上设置多个属性时，你可以通过执行这些事务内的更改来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Some operations handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionOpening> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> events and perform work only when a transaction is not in progress.
trans-unit.target: 某些操作处理<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionOpening>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed>事件并仅在一个事务未正在进行时，才执行工作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionClosed> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.TransactionOpening>

trans-unit.source: For more information on using transactions, see the documentation for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 使用事务的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>的文档

trans-unit.source: A title or description for the newly created transaction.
trans-unit.target: 标题或新创建的事务的说明。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you have completed the steps in your transaction, you should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*> on this object.
trans-unit.target: 当事务完成步骤后时，应调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>对此对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction.Commit*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this designer is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 在停用此设计器时发生。

trans-unit.source: A designer is deactivated just before it is no longer displayed.
trans-unit.target: 不再显示之前，将停用一个设计器。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Destroys the specified component and removes it from the designer container.
trans-unit.target: 销毁指定的组件并将其从设计器的容器中删除。

trans-unit.source: The component to destroy.
trans-unit.target: 要销毁的组件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer instance that contains the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含指定的组件的设计器实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to retrieve the designer for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>检索的设计器。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no designer for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner"> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有指定组件设计器。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the specified, fully qualified type name.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的完全限定类型名称的实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type to load.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The type object for the specified type name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the type cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 指定的类型名称的类型对象或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer host is currently in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器宿主目前是否在事务中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a transaction is in progress; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在事务正在进行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this designer completes loading its document.
trans-unit.target: 此设计器完成加载其文档时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after a designer completes loading its document.
trans-unit.target: 在设计器完成加载其文档后，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer host is currently loading the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器宿主是否正在加载文档。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer host is currently loading the document; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果设计器主机当前正在加载文档;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of the base class used as the root component for the current design.
trans-unit.target: 获取用作当前设计的根组件的基类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This base class is typically a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> instance; it defines the class for which the user's derived class extends.
trans-unit.target: 此基类通常是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>实例; 它定义为其用户的派生的类扩展的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the root component class.
trans-unit.target: 根组件类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified name of the class being designed.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在设计的类的完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the base component class.
trans-unit.target: 基组件类的完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the TransactionClosed event.
trans-unit.target: 添加事件处理程序 TransactionClosed 事件。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after a transaction is closed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭事务后，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: A transaction can sometimes change multiple values.
trans-unit.target: 事务有时可以更改多个值。

trans-unit.source: The transaction methods provide a way to prevent performance and flicker problems by avoiding repetitive processing.
trans-unit.target: 事务方法提供了如何防止性能和闪烁通过避免重复处理的问题。

trans-unit.source: These methods defer processing until after the transaction has closed.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法将处理推迟到后事务已关闭。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the TransactionClosing event.
trans-unit.target: 添加事件处理程序 TransactionClosing 事件。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs just before a transaction is completed.
trans-unit.target: 恰好在某一事务完成之前，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: A transaction can sometimes change multiple values.
trans-unit.target: 事务有时可以更改多个值。

trans-unit.source: The transaction methods provide a way to prevent performance and flicker problems by avoiding repetitive processing.
trans-unit.target: 事务方法提供了如何防止性能和闪烁通过避免重复处理的问题。

trans-unit.source: These methods defer processing until after the transaction has closed.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法将处理推迟到后事务已关闭。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前事务的说明。

trans-unit.source: The description is the last description specified with <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.CreateTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 说明是<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.CreateTransaction%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.CreateTransaction%2A>使用指定的最后一个描述

trans-unit.source: A description of the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 当前事务的说明。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the TransactionOpened event.
trans-unit.target: 添加事件处理程序 TransactionOpened 事件。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a transaction has begun.
trans-unit.target: 事务开始时发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: A transaction can sometimes change multiple values.
trans-unit.target: 事务有时可以更改多个值。

trans-unit.source: The transaction methods provide a way to prevent performance and flicker problems by avoiding repetitive processing.
trans-unit.target: 事务方法提供了如何防止性能和闪烁通过避免重复处理的问题。

trans-unit.source: These methods defer processing until after the transaction has closed.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法将处理推迟到后事务已关闭。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the TransactionOpening event.
trans-unit.target: 添加事件处理程序 TransactionOpening 事件。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a transaction is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: 将要开始事务时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: This method allows designer host clients to perform operations before other handlers are notified that a transaction has begun.
trans-unit.target: 此方法允许设计器宿主客户端之前通知其他处理程序的事务已开始执行操作。

trans-unit.source: The specified handler is called only when the first call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.CreateTransaction%2A> is made.
trans-unit.target: 指定的处理程序调用仅的首次调用到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.CreateTransaction%2A>进行。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.CreateTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls do not generate this event until all transaction objects have been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 后续调用不会生成此事件，直到已释放所有的事务对象。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
